info: This corpus is an automatically annotated version of data from the Parallel Bible Corpus (Mayer & Cysouw 2014) that has been reduced in scope for the purposes of crosslinguistic research. Metadata from the original PBC file is included in this dict for reference, as well as the license information and the automatic POS annotations. The first three characters of the filename corresponds to the ISO 639-3 code for the respective language. The `tagged` key in this dict contains a list of lists, with the first item in each sublist being the verse number (following PBC convention) and the second being a list of tuples in [word, POS] format where `unk` represents unknown tags.
license: This data is shared under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license, and can be used solely for research purposes. The data is a selection of non-contiguous verses from a translation for the purpose of crosslinguistic research. Copyright of selected verses of each translation is retained by the original copyright holders.
metadata: # english_title: The Bible in Slovak (Slovak Standard Version)

# copyright_long: Biblia, Slovenský ekumenický preklad, 2008
© Slovenská biblická spoločnosť
Translation was carried out in 1990 - 2007. Issue in the work to the Bible by epresentatives of member churches SBS (in alphabetical order): Apostolic Church in Slovakia, Baptist, Seventh Day Adventists, Brethren Church, Evangelical Church, evangelical Church Methodist, Greek Catholic Church, Orthodox Church, reformed Church, the Roman Catholic Church. The work of translation of the Old Testament led the group of prof. ThDr. George Band. Group work translation of the New Testament by doc. ThDr. John Grešo. The text was approved by the Slovak Bishops' Conference on 27 3 2008 no. 9-K/08. For more information contact Slovak Bible Society: office@biblickaspolocnost.sk, www.biblickaspolocnost.sk.
Biblia, Slovenský ekumenický preklad, 2008
© Slovenská biblická spoločnosť
Preklad sa realizoval v rokoch 1990 — 2007. Na prácach pri vydaní Biblie sa zúčastňovali zástupcovia členských cirkví SBS (v abecednom poradí): Apoštolská cirkev na Slovensku, Bratská jednota baptistov, Cirkev adventistov siedmeho dňa, Cirkev bratská, Evanjelická cirkev augsburského vyznania, Evanjelická cirkev metodistická, Gréckokatolícka cirkev, Pravoslávna cirkev, Reformovaná kresťanská cirkev, Rímskokatolícka cirkev. Prácu prekladateľskej skupiny Starej Zmluvy viedol prof. ThDr. Juraj Bándy. Prácu prekladateľskej skupiny Novej Zmluvy viedol doc. ThDr. Ján Grešo. Text bol schválený Konferenciou biskupov Slovenska dňa 27. 3. 2008, č. 9-K/08. Pre viac informácií kontaktujte Slovenskú biblickú spoločnosť: office@biblickaspolocnost.sk, www.biblickaspolocnost.sk.
